column4: Hi, anyone know how to force 7.10 desktop to fully extend monitor screen ? I have screen borders not covered by desktop.
dont want to rezise monitor with its button, I use other O/S that will be impacted if I do this
have you tried that? With my monitor, resizing it with the button only seems to affect the current OS
that's just from my experience, no risk trying.. worst is you waste 10 mins
